enhanced_transcript:
Interviewer: Tell me about your last project.
Candidate: It was fine.
Interviewer: How do you reason about scalability?
Candidate: We had services, but I cannot share details.
Interviewer: Any production incidents and ownership examples?
Candidate: Not much to add.
